introduction: Singapore's and Malaysia's Chinese share similar cultural backgrounds and migration history, so delicacies in both places have similarities and differences. Bryan, Herman and Chef Melvyn embark on a road trip to Malaysia on a food truck for a culinary exchange between Singapore and Malaysia. 新马华人有着相似的文化背景和移民脉络，新马两地美食自然也同中有异、异中有同。主持人王禄江、郭坤耀和厨师李尚滨开着餐车，并在马来西亚不同地区停留，烹煮两地看似相同却又不同的美食，开启新马美食的交流之旅。Cast & Crew
